thread.title: Kymeta Announces Appointment of David Harrower as Senior Vice President, Global Sales

author: cnbc.com
title: Kymeta Announces Appointment of David Harrower as Senior Vice President, Global Sales
text:
15-year satellite communications industry veteran to lead rapidly growing, worldwide communications sales team
REDMOND, Wash.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Kymeta —the communications company making good on the promise of global, mobile connectivity—announced today that David Harrower will join the company as Senior Vice President, Global Sales, effective March 12, 2018.
Kymeta recognizes the appointment of Harrower as a crucial component of the company’s focus on global growth and accessibility across markets. “We are thrilled to have David join Kymeta as Senior Vice President, Global Sales. David brings an impressive leadership reputation, a wealth of sales and satellite industry experience, and a lifelong passion for making ubiquitous connectivity a reality,” said Neville Meijers, Chief Commercial Officer and Executive Vice President. “We are confident that David is the right person to lead our global sales strategy and to help us realize our vision of making mobile connectivity accessible to every business in the world, no matter where they are located and whether they require fixed or mobile solutions.”
Harrower has extensive experience leading, innovating, and building business communications and connectivity on a global scale, including having guided multiple companies to successful growth. He comes to Kymeta most recently from VT iDirect, where as Vice President, International Sales and Business Development, he developed quick-growth sales strategies that led to rapid global business expansion. Harrower previously also served as Regional Vice President, Russia, CIS, developing and executing strategy for Western/Eastern Europe and Russia/CIS. Prior to VT iDirect, Harrower served as Director, Russia, CIS, CEE, for Comtech, where he developed strategy for sales teams working in Eastern Europe.
“I cannot imagine a more exciting or important time to join the team at Kymeta. With solutions that touch every corner of the world, and provide the answer to communications needs that have been unanswered for decades, Kymeta is well-positioned to provide seamless, always-on connectivity to the world in ways that most people have never considered,” said Harrower. “I have spent much of my career in communications, providing solutions that make it easier to connect and remain connected. I look forward to working with this great team to make ubiquitous, reliable connectivity the norm.”
About Kymeta
The world’s demand for ubiquitous mobile connectivity is irrefutable. A global, mobile network is the answer to connecting people and places that have never been connected before.
Kymeta is making seamless, always-connected mobile communications possible with a unique hybrid approach that enables satellite and cellular networks to together deliver a single, global, mobile network. End-to-end mobile communications are delivered with Kymeta™ KĀLO™ connectivity services, and the world’s first electronically-steered, flat panel satellite terminal that goes places traditional satellite dishes cannot. The Kymeta KyWay™ terminal makes high-throughput, mobile communications possible in cars, trains, buses, trucks, boats and much more.
If it moves, Kymeta keeps it connected.
For more information, visit kymetacorp.com and KALO.net .
